summary: Phase 1 deep analysis complete. 3 sorries remain. Key finding: buildSeedForList_propagates_box is UNPROVABLE with current construction (createNewFamily doesn't copy BoxContent). Consistency sorries need derivability tracking. Documented path forward.

artifacts.summary: 3 sorries remain at lines 5709, 5734, 5923. Build passes with 0 errors.
Phase 1 status documented with detailed blocker analysis

partial_progress.details: Deep analysis of remaining 3 sorries. buildSeedForList_propagates_box appears UNPROVABLE because createNewFamily doesn't copy BoxContent from existing families - new families created after Box processing don't receive the box content. Consistency sorries require tracking that buildSeedAux only adds derivable formulas.
remaining_work: foldl_buildSeedAux_preserves_seedConsistent (line 5709) - needs derivability invariant: buildSeedAux only adds formulas derivable from phi
buildSeedForList_consistent (line 5734) - needs mutual consistency propagation through seed ops
buildSeedForList_propagates_box (line 5923) - LIKELY UNPROVABLE: createNewFamily doesn't copy BoxContent
proven_lemmas: setConsistent_insert_from_superset - if phi in S, T subset S, S consistent, then insert phi T consistent
box_content_in_mcs approach - modal_t axiom enables Box phi -> phi in MCS
technical_findings: buildSeedForList_propagates_box FALSE for order: [Box beta, negBox alpha]. Box beta adds beta to family 0, then negBox alpha creates family 1 WITHOUT beta.
Consistency sorries need invariant: entry.formulas subset of (derivable from input set)
set_mcs_closed_under_derivation exists but requires SetMaximalConsistent, not just SetConsistent
recommended_actions: Option A: Modify createNewFamily to copy BoxContent from existing families
Option B: Remove buildSeedForList_propagates_box and handle box coherence in Phase 2/3
Option C: Constrain buildSeedForList to process Box formulas LAST

completion_data.completion_summary: Phase 1 analysis session: analyzed remaining 3 sorries in depth. Key finding: buildSeedForList_propagates_box is likely unprovable with current construction due to createNewFamily not copying BoxContent. Consistency sorries require derivability tracking infrastructure. Documented recommended paths forward.
